items.question: How long does it take to deploy H'appi?
items.answer: Basic deployment takes between 3 and 7 days depending on the complexity of your needs. Our team guides you every step of the way, from setup to going live. The Free plan can be activated in minutes.

items.question: Does H'appi replace my support agents?
items.answer: No, and that's our core philosophy. H'appi augments your teams by handling repetitive requests (up to 80% of volume). Your agents focus on complex, high-value cases. 51% of companies seek to balance human and technology, and that's exactly our approach.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. All data is hosted in France, in certified data centers. We are 100% GDPR compliant. No data is shared with third parties. For Enterprise plans, on-premise deployment is available.

items.question: What integrations are available?
items.answer: H'appi natively integrates with major CRMs (Salesforce, HubSpot), ERPs (SAP, Oracle), messaging tools (WhatsApp, Messenger, Teams) and e-commerce platforms (Shopify, WooCommerce). Open APIs enable custom integrations.

items.question: How does H'appi's AI work?
items.answer: Our chatbots use generative AI and natural language processing (NLP) to understand your customers' intentions. The system continuously learns from every interaction to improve its responses. Industry templates (CX, Supply Chain) are available from setup.

items.question: Can I try before committing?
items.answer: Yes! Our Free plan lets you test H'appi with 100 conversations per month, no commitment and no credit card required. Starter and Professional plans offer a 14-day free trial with all features.

items.question: What is the average resolution rate?
items.answer: Our clients observe an average automatic resolution rate of 85 to 94% on level 1 requests. This rate continuously improves through AI learning. The average response time is under 2 seconds.
